title: Who's Older, Ahri or Zoe?
body:
They both look young, but Zoe is actually over a thousand years old, and the mythology surrounding nine tailed foxes says that they have to be around 1000 years old, at least. 

So who's older? Is Ahri not actually that old with her new vastayan lore? or does Zoe's age not count because she still looks 12?

replies.body:
1000s years old, Zoe wins.

There is no info about Ahri having the same "lore" as actual fox spirits.

> [{quoted}](name=Stars Shaper,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=gWg3KgjX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-12T12:43:22.789+0000)
>
> 1000s years old, Zoe wins.
> 
> There is no info about Ahri having the same "lore" as actual fox spirits.

Remember to check your [field journal](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/vastaya-field-journal/) ;)
(There's nothing in there that states Ahri's age specifically, but it does say that some vastaya can live a very long time.  That is, if you can believe anything Mr Santangelo reports.)

Yeah I remeber it. xD

I really giggled reading his meeting with Ahri. Anyway, Cosmic entities give more the feeling of ageless and close-to-immortal than vastaya, but that's a personal opinion.
Could have sworn there was something about her stealing people's essence that made her live longer, like a super long time.
I think Vastaya can live much longer than humans in general,however even with that in mind I really doubt that Ahri is over a thousand years old.

You are right, Ahriâ€™s lore didnâ€™t state anything about her age. I think Ahri can be somewhat older than Xayah and Syndra, which means she is still young or can be somewhere above 100, but the latter is unlikely.
Nothing about her age though. I've not read her new lore but I recall that her consuming humans is a way to humanize even more and can't escape that hunger.
That was changed to stealing memories to keep her youth or something.
Yeah, she can extend her life probably, but Zoe is straight up ancient.
Correct me if im wrong but Zoe herself is young but the aspect that inhabits her body is ancient...

Zoe was like, 10 or something when she first got chosen by the Aspect of Twilight, but she only came back to Runeterra over a thousand years later. Though technically, her lore says she only aged a year or two during that time. So could she have lived out that 1000 years or did she time travel?
She doesnt time travel.  Shes just that old.

No,appearantly the aspect slowed down Zoes aging process

Taken directly from her lore:

> Returning home after millennia, Zoe has aged barely a year.
